articles.author: ESPN News Services
articles.title: France, Portugal, Belgium clinch Euro 2024 qualification - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Kylian Mbappé and Cristiano Ronaldo both scored twice to help France and Portugal secure a spot at next year's European Championship along with Belgium.
articles.content: Kylian Mbappé and Cristiano Ronaldo both scored twice to help France and Portugal secure a spot at next year's European Championship with a perfect record in qualifying, with Belgium also clinching a… [+4501 chars]

articles.author: Susan Kreimer
articles.title: Can't sleep? Your skin might be to blame, study says - UPI News
articles.description: A new global study suggests that 42% of patients with skin disease suffer from sleep disturbances. Findings were to be presented Friday at the European Academy of Dermatology and Venereology Congress in Berlin.
articles.content:
NEW YORK, Oct. 12 (UPI) -- A new global study suggests that 42% of patients with skin disease suffer from sleep disturbances.
